jollyRoger.description: A square pig skull with a snout and rounded teeth

statusHistory.reason: Crew was active and terrorizing Nanohana
Entire crew killed by Crocodile in Episode 92

keyMoments.title: Terrorizing Nanohana
keyMoments.description: The Puppu Pirates are shown looting and pillaging Nanohana, taking advantage of Arabasta's civil war chaos.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes them as opportunistic villains and sets up Crocodile's demonstration of power.

keyMoments.title: Annihilated by Crocodile
keyMoments.description: After Puppu insults Crocodile and orders his crew to attack, Crocodile uses his sand powers to dehydrate and kill the entire crew instantly.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Crocodile's overwhelming power and marks the end of the Puppu Pirates.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a crown and crossbones

keyMoments.title: Mr. 2's Identity Revealed to Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: When Mr. 2's swan ship arrives, the Straw Hats realize that their new friend is actually an officer agent of Baroque Works, their enemy organization.
keyMoments.significance: Creates dramatic tension as the crew realizes they've befriended an enemy agent, while also establishing the complex relationship between Mr. 2 and the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile's Public Hero Act
keyMoments.description: Crocodile, the secret leader of Baroque Works, appears in Nanohana as the kingdom's hero, demonstrating how he uses his Warlord status to maintain a false public image.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the dual nature of Baroque Works' leader - publicly a hero, secretly orchestrating the civil war.
